publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-173# Mr John McAllion: Right of access to Crown Office files and information-That the Parliament supports the rights of families of murder victims, including Mr and Mrs Crossan of Dundee, to access to all Crown Office files and information relating to the resulting murder trials.
S1M-173# Right of access to Crown Office files and information (lodged on 28 September 1999) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-173# Mr John McAllion: Right of access to Crown Office files and information-That the Parliament supports the rights of families of murder victims, including Mr and Mrs Crossan of Dundee, to access to all Crown Office files and information relating to the resulting murder trials. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

S1M-173# Mr John McAllion: Right of access to Crown Office files and information—That the Parliament supports the rights of families of murder victims, including Mr and Mrs Crossan of Dundee, to access to all Crown Office files and information relating to the resulting murder trials. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan

S1M-173# Mr John McAllion: Right of access to Crown Office files and information—That the Parliament supports the rights of families of murder victims, including Mr and Mrs Crossan of Dundee, to access to all Crown Office files and information relating to the resulting murder trials. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
S1M-173# Right of access to Crown Office files and information (lodged on 28 September 1999) Elaine Smith*
S1M-173# Right of access to Crown Office files and information (lodged on 28 September 1999) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-173# Mr John McAllion: Right of access to Crown Office files and information—That the Parliament supports the rights of families of murder victims, including Mr and Mrs Crossan of Dundee, to access to all Crown Office files and information relating to the resulting murder trials. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Elaine Smith, Cathy Jamieson
